channel.title: Black Mesa Movie Models
channel.description:
Hey guys.
I've been experimenting with Source Filmmaker and found out that the current models in game don't have an automated phoneme set. Other than having to painstakingly assign each sound a movement (and in turn assign the model phoneme expressions), I was wondering if anyone (Probably BM devs) had certain models they used to make the trailer movie? As they say, "Work smarter, not harder" and it would be extremely helpful to have these models for my project. I want to make an animated documentary on a map I've been working on based on a little story I wrote and showed some friends.
Thanks!
Judo101
(P.S. if this is the wrong area to post this sorry!)
